ygData.msgSnippet: Luzbel: The trasmetal dragon saw the fight and looking to Aerotaur, he transformed to robot mode. Luzbel s body in robot mode was strange: his legs and arms

Luzbel:

The trasmetal dragon saw the fight and looking to Aerotaur, he 
transformed to robot mode. Luzbel's body in robot mode was strange:  
his legs and arms had metalic scales and they ended in sharped craws 
while his trunk and chest armour's like his helmet had silver metals 
with strange reliefs that decorated them.

His robot mode was similar his master Darkfate, but several things 
made him diferent. In one arms, Luzbel had a megablaster (Like 
MEgatron G1)

His pale handsome face didn't show his evil spark. Just his pale blue 
eyes showed, at time, his pride and devil spark.

"What do you think??? " mocked Luzbel while he saw Aerotaur "I needed 
kill someone today... Unluckely you'll die..."  

Luzbel without said anything shot against Aerotaur 5 shot's


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Burning Hammer: Party? Party?
> 
> Burning Hammer couldn't find a reply, his brains had been 
scrambled. He
> stared at Perplex.
> 
> Burning Hammer: Hahaha, party on.
> 
> He walks up to Perplex. Perplex strikes a fighting pose. He strikes 
Burning
> Hammer several times in the face. Burning Hammer pulls out a gun, 
something
> he swore he wouldn't use, and fired it rapidly into Perplex. Perplex
> couldn't take the damage and fell over. His computer started to 
warn him to
> go into stasis lock.
> 
> Burning Hammer: The better man won.
> 
> Burning Hammer fired repeatedly into Perplex. With one final 
crackle,
> Perplex mumbled about his family and went into stasis lock. Burning 
Hammer
> draws a knife and puts away his gun...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----

to
